TestCase.Title: Test case EID_CLIENT_D_12
TestCase.Purpose: This test case evaluates the user interface of the eID-Client regarding the PIN-Pad functionality if the card reader has no secure PIN entry.
TestCase.Precondition: The card reader connected has no secure PIN entry.

ExpectedResult.Text: The eID-Client requested the user to enter his PIN.
The eID-Client provided a PIN-Pad functionality to the user.
The user interface had a dedicated window which was clearly distinguishable from the web browser by the user.
